title: Textile, 1995-50-188, 1801–50
medium: Printed by engraved roller on cotton plain weave.
inscribed: At the foot of a pillar at the far right, "E. Feldtrappe".
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 75 x 77.5 cm (29 1/2 x 30 1/2 in.)
description: Two scenes, both captioned in French, illustrating the difference between two days of marriage and two years of marriage with a couple prominent in each scene. In brown on white.
